rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: Connected to a small reception area that leads into the living room, designed with natural lighting and Vastu compliant positioning.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, allowing for easy service and adherence to Vastu principles regarding dining direction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact yet functional design with efficient layout. Includes a storage area for utensils in line with traditional Indian practices.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room for the owner, with adjoining bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom, ensuring privacy and adequate ventilation as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Smaller room designed for children or guests, positioned to maintain energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated space for domestic help with essential facilities and privacy as per local norms.
